MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  CW1 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Lime Tree Avenue, Remer Street and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:07AM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 1:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:32AM on 2nd December 2020
